status.description: Current status of the light bulb. True means ON, and False means OFF.

brightness.description: Brightness level of the light bulb (0-100).

setBrightness.description: Set the brightness level of the light bulb.

statusChange.description: Event emitted when the status of the light bulb changes.

brightnessChange.description: Event emitted when the brightness level of the light bulb changes.
